Statements.Statement: select CForm.AssetId,work.WorkNo WorkerId,work.WorkDate,work.AreaId,CForm.ShiftId,work.WorkNo from SAFVIET_tblWorks work left join FA_tblCheckingForm CForm on CForm.CheckingNum=work.WorkNo where work.WorkType = '3' and work.BUID = @BUID
select Id,Attime from FA_tblShifts_Attime where Stop = 0 and ShiftID = @ShiftID and BUID = @BUID
update FA_tblCheckingFormList set Result_Yes=@Value where Id=@Id
